snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 478: Sonic Point of Action (SAGE2008)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Point of Action - SAGE2008
Credit1: DeltaSpeeds
Credit2: Sonic Overtime
Release Date: August 17th, 2008

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Boot&Title
00:42 - Dry Desert (SAGE2008)

(EXTRA)
05:29 - Steep Canyon (Sonic Overtime)

NOTES: Moving on from "Advance 4" Sonic finds himself in a 3D World.
Deep in the middle of a Dry Desert, but I will insert doubt here considering the fact...
That Sonic is so slippery he can't keep a foothold what so ever.
Sonic is also occasionally feeling rebellious and refuses to homing attack a target.
Side from that, we also have a custom level made by a different person bundled in here.
A large Canyon with questionable Music volumes and so much open space you could fall for days...
Literally...
With all of that said and done, despite the the hilarious amount of jank and what feels like PS1 physics control.
It's kinda interesting, better than just a 3D Sandbox where you don't really play a level and just mess about.
